rules_text:
Agile [i](This creature deals combat damage first as long as it's attacking.)[/i]
Whenever Jules attacks, target attacking Galaxian you control gets +1/+1 and gains lifelink until end of turn.
flavor_text: [i]“Now, I ain't the leader of the Dust Devils, but I can speak on his behalf. If you can shoot a gun, you're in.”[/i]
